Dashboards

2024 Oscar Prediction Challenge!

2024 Oscar Prediction Challenge Dashboard is an interactive shiny app that presents the results of a survey where participants predicted the winners of various Oscars categories.

Covid-19

Covid-19 Dashboard is an interactive analysis tool that specifically examines Covid-19 cases and fatalities in both the United States and my home state of Oregon. What initially began as a class project at the onset of the pandemic, has undergone multiple iterations and refinements to evolve into a fully functional and informative dashboard.

Randi Bolt 2024
Made with Quarto and deployed with Netlify.
